texts.text: Hey yoo! Press that green thingy to interact with the dude on the right... you can also read the boards!!!
Hey yoo! Press spacebar to interact with the dude on the right... you can also read the boards!!!
My friend's house. Not sure which one was built first. Yet I think that this one's roof doesn't sit quite straight.
KEEP OFF THE GRASS....  hahahah haahahahah hahahaha, for sure.
LAB. This is a house where all the mighty experiment take place. One day I will have a lab on my own.
Ah whist, will ya? Look at those flowers. Magnificent, isn't it?

I’ve begun my voyage in a paper boat without a bottom, I will fly to the moon in it. I’ve been folded along a creasing time, a weakness in the sheet of life. Now you’ve settled on the opposite side of the paper to me.
Yep, this place was the very essence of fuckery. It leaked off every dollar they put into it, and it sickened me!
Are you happy bothering me all the time?
There is nothing to tell... go to hell
